armyRules.name: Oath of Moment
armyRules.description:
If your Army Faction is ADEPTUS ASTARTES, at the start of your Command phase, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Until the start of your next Command phase, that enemy unit is your Oath of Moment target. Each time a model with this ability makes an attack that targets your Oath of Moment target:
• You can re-roll the Hit roll.
• If you are using a Codex: Space Marines Detachment and your army does not include one or more units with the BLACK TEMPLARS, BLOOD ANGELS, DARK ANGELS, DEATHWATCH or SPACE WOLVES keywords, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.
armyRules.flavorText: In battle, Space Marines swear mighty oaths to destroy the enemies of the Emperor and uphold the honour of their Chapter, and such vows are sacrosanct. When the Angels of Death strike, they do so with the precision of a surgeon and the force of a thunderbolt. Experience and strategic expertise help them to read the shifting shape of the battle with post-human speed and clarity, directing their wrath towards one priority target after another. Command assets are annihilated, leaving the enemy reeling leaderless. Heavy armour, potent artillery and the vaunted elites of the foe’s forces are laid waste with horrifying speed, until the Emperor’s Angels of Death stand victorious over a field of smouldering wreckage and bolt-riddled corpses, and honour is finally satisfied.

armyRules.name: Space Marine Chapters
armyRules.description:
• If an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit has a second Faction keyword on its datasheet, that Faction keyword is the name of that unit’s Chapter. For example, MARNEUS CALGAR has both the ADEPTUS ASTARTES and ULTRAMARINES Faction keywords, and is therefore from the Ultramarines Chapter.
• You cannot include units from more than one Chapter in your army.
• If your army includes one or more BLACK TEMPLARS units, it cannot include any ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models, and cannot include any of the following models that do not have the Black Templars keyword: GLADIATOR LANCER; GLADIATOR REAPER; GLADIATOR VALIANT; IMPULSOR; REPULSOR; REPULSOR EXECUTIONER.
• If your army includes one or more DEATHWATCH units, it cannot include any of the following units: DEVASTATOR SQUAD; SCOUT SQUAD; TACTICAL SQUAD.
• If your army includes one or more SPACE WOLVES units, it cannot include any of the following units: APOTHECARY; DEVASTATOR SQUAD; TACTICAL SQUAD.

armyRules.name: Deathwatch
armyRules.description:
• Your army can include ADEPTUS ASTARTES DEATHWATCH units, but it cannot include any ADEPTUS ASTARTES units drawn from any other Chapter.
• With the exception of KILL TEAM CASSIUS (see Legends: Agents of the Imperium), your army cannot include any AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM DEATHWATCH units.
• Your army cannot include any of the following units: ASSAULT SQUAD; ASSAULT SQUAD WITH JUMP PACKS; ATTACK BIKE SQUAD; DEVASTATOR SQUAD; LAND SPEEDER STORM; RELIC TERMINATOR SQUAD; SCOUT BIKE SQUAD; SCOUT SQUAD; SCOUT SNIPER SQUAD; TACTICAL SQUAD; TERMINATOR ASSAULT SQUAD; TERMINATOR SQUAD.

detachments.name: Gladius Task Force
detachments.abilityDescription:
At the start of your Command phase, you can select one of the Combat Doctrines listed below. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active and its effects apply to all ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army. You can only select each Combat Doctrine once per battle.Devastator Doctrine
This unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced.
Tactical Doctrine
This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
Assault Doctrine
This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: The Codex Astartes has proven its worth as a superb treatise on warfare over countless battlefields, and has remained so even after ten thousand years. Many Space Marines hold its wisdom in awe, and exemplify its teachings, employing a flexible set of combat doctrines to eliminate their enemy. Few opponents can withstand the fury of such an onslaught.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: ONLY IN DEATH DOES DUTY END
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: HONOUR THE CHAPTER
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

stratagems.name: ADAPTIVE STRATEGY
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select the Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for that unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that doctrine this battle.

stratagems.name: STORM OF FIRE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

stratagems.name: SQUAD TACTICS
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is under the effects of the Tactical Doctrine.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

enhancements.name: Artificer Armour
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. The bearer has a Save characteristic of 2+ and the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
enhancements.flavorText: Crafted by the Chapter’s finest artificers, this suit of armour provides superior protection.

enhancements.name: The Honour Vehement
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons. While the bearer is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, add 2 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearers melee weapons instead.
enhancements.flavorText: This stanza is inscribed on thrice-blessed parchment and affixed to its bearers’ wargear with a purity seal, there to inspire them to heroic acts of martial prowess.

enhancements.name: Adept of the Codex
enhancements.description: CAPTAIN model only. At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer is on the battlefield, instead of selecting a Combat Doctrine to be active for your army, you can select the Tactical Doctrine. If you do, until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for the bearer’s unit only, even if you have already selected that Combat Doctrine to be active for your army this battle.
enhancements.flavorText: An ardent student of the Codex Astartes, this commander epitomises its tactical genius, and the wisdom gleaned from its teachings guides their measured strategic responses amidst the fiercest battle.

enhancements.name: Fire Discipline
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. In addition, while the bearer’s unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, you can reroll Advance rolls made for that unit.
enhancements.flavorText: This commander drills his warriors relentlessly; combined with the Adeptus Astartes’ incredible reflexes, they produce a devastating rate of fire.

detachments.name: Anvil Siege Force
detachments.abilityDescription: Ranged weapons equipped by ADEPTUS ASTARTES models from your army have the [HEAVY] ability. If such a weapon already has this ability, each time an attack is made with that weapon, if the attacking model’s unit Remained Stationary this turn, add 1 to the Wound roll.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: Across blood-drenched battlefields, within towering citadels and isolated orbital stations, the Angels of Death throw back tides of traitors, mutants, xenos and heretics, and purge enemy holdings of foes thanks to their disciplined strategies and fighting skills. All who oppose them are met with volleys of deadly accurate firepower long before they reach the battle-brothers’ razor-sharp blades.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: RIGID DISCIPLINE
stratagems.when: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can immediately make a Fall Back move of up to 6".
stratagems.restrictions: When making that move, your unit must end that move either wholly within your deployment zone or within range of an objective marker.

stratagems.name: NOT ONE BACKWARDS STEP
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army within range of an objective marker.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, double the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit, but it must Remain Stationary this turn.

stratagems.name: NO THREAT TOO GREAT
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: BATTLE DRILL RECALL
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If your unit Remained Stationary this turn, then until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.name: HAIL OF VENGEANCE
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

enhancements.name: Indomitable Fury
enhancements.description: GRAVIS model only. The first time the bearer is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set the bearer back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.
enhancements.flavorText: This hero refuses to yield whilst foes remain, fighting back from the brink of death like a vengeful demigod.

enhancements.name: Fleet Commander
enhancements.description: CAPTAIN model only. Once per battle, at the start of your Shooting phase, you can select one point on the battlefield and place a marker on that point. At the start of your next Shooting phase, place another marker on the battlefield within 12" of the centre of the first marker, then draw a straight line between the centre of each of these markers. Roll one D6 for each unit that line passes over or through: on a 3+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Both markers are then removed.
enhancements.flavorText: The Chapter’s orbiting warships stand ready to unleash devastation at this leader’s command.

enhancements.name: Stoic Defender
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability while they are within range of an objective marker you control and, while that unit is Battle-shocked, halve the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit instead of changing it to 0.
enhancements.flavorText: This commander and their warriors hold their ground tenaciously against even overwhelming numbers.

enhancements.name: Architect of War
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.
enhancements.flavorText: There are few who have a deeper understanding of the tenets of siege warfare than this warrior.

detachments.name: Ironstorm Spearhead
detachments.abilityDescription: Once per phase for each ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit in your army, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll or one Damage roll made for a model in that unit.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: An Ironstorm Spearhead’s commanders guide their assault with pre-cogitated fire solutions, cycling data-gheist inloads and whispered binharic auguries. These ensure their warriors, and the belligerent machine spirits inhabiting their war engines, deliver their fire with inescapable accuracy.

stratagems.name: UNBOWED CONVICTION
stratagems.when: Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: MERCY IS WEAKNESS
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and when making such an attack, if the attacking model is a VEHICLE, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.name: VENGEFUL ANIMUS
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

stratagems.name: ANCIENT FURY
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER model from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model’s Move, Toughness, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: POWER OF THE MACHINE SPIRIT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

enhancements.name: Target Augury Web
enhancements.description: TECHMARINE model only. In your Command phase, select one ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model within 6" of the bearer. Until the start of your next Command phase, weapons equipped by that VEHICLE model have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
enhancements.flavorText: This spearhead commander uses advanced augmetics to distribute targeting data. With these, they direct the fire of their war engine crews and rouse their machine spirits to operative superiority.

enhancements.name: The Flesh is Weak
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.
enhancements.flavorText: The injuries of past battles have seen this warrior heavily rebuilt with ultra-durable cybernetic limbs and organs that render them extremely difficult to kill.

enhancements.name: Adept of the Omnissiah
enhancements.description: TECHMARINE model only. Once per battle round, when a saving throw is failed for a friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model within 6" of the bearer, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.
enhancements.flavorText: This battle-brother is steeped in hidden technological rites. Should their armoured charges be threatened, a burst of arcane binharic screed can rouse their machine spirits to vigilance.

enhancements.name: Master of Machine War
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. In your Command phase, select one ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model within 6" of the bearer. Until the start of your next Command phase, that VEHICLE is eligible to shoot even if it Fell Back or Advanced this turn.
enhancements.flavorText: This commander is supremely gifted in the strategies of armoured warfare, understanding the capabilities of every war engine in the Chapters arsenal. Delivering precision orders, they ensure the vehicles under their command inflict the most punishing damage to the enemy even amidst complex manoeuvres.

detachments.name: Firestorm Assault Force
detachments.abilityDescription: Ranged weapons equipped by ADEPTUS ASTARTES models from your army have the [ASSAULT] ability, and each time an attack made with such a weapon targets a unit within 12", add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: The Space Marines are the Emperor’s finest shock troops, striking at the foe before they can react. In their rapid, mechanised assaults, Space Marines smash aside the enemy, destroying them at close quarters without mercy.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: CRUCIBLE OF BATTLE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target within 6", add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: RAPID EMBARKATION
stratagems.when: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TRANSPORT unit from your army that has no models embarked within it, and one ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT.
stratagems.effect: Your INFANTRY unit can embark within that TRANSPORT.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot target an INFANTRY unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, that cannot normally embark within that TRANSPORT, or that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

stratagems.name: IMMOLATION PROTOCOLS
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

stratagems.name: ONSLAUGHT OF FIRE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 12", add 1 to the Hit roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: BURNING VENGEANCE
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TRANSPORT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: One unit embarked within that TRANSPORT can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

enhancements.name: Champion of Humanity
enhancements.description: TACTICUS model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit can ignore any or all modifiers to their characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for them (excluding modifiers to saving throws).
enhancements.flavorText: This commander and their warriors have vowed to secure victory and defend the Imperium from the horrors of the galaxy.

enhancements.name: War-tempered Artifice
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY model only. Add 3 to the Strength characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons.
enhancements.flavorText: Having laboured long in the Chapter’s forges, this warrior-smith has crafted his personal armaments. Each weapon is a masterwork tool of death-dealing, wrought with care and strength, and embellished with the icons of their maker’s brotherhood.

enhancements.name: Forged in Battle
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, once per turn, after making a Hit roll or a saving throw for a model in that unit, you can change the result of that roll to an unmodified 6.
enhancements.flavorText: To this Angel of Death, war is the anvil upon which their strength is wrought. Every battle is seen as a test in which they and their battle-brothers can prove themselves, and the superior craftsmanship of their weapons and armour.

enhancements.name: Adamantine Mantle
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack. If that attack was made with a Melta or Torrent weapon, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1 instead.
enhancements.flavorText: This flowing cloak or finely wrought tabard is laced through with threads of braided adamantine. When combined with armour and energy fields, it has been shown time and again that these symbols of office are proof against even the very strongest attacks.

detachments.name: Stormlance Task Force
detachments.abilityDescription: ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army are eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which they Advanced or Fell Back.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: The warriors of a Stormlance Task Force employ high-speed tactics and hit-and-run warfare. They do battle on the move, wrong-footing their enemies with breakneck manoeuvres and melting away one moment only to crash home like a thunderbolt the next.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: BLITZING FUSILLADE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability. If such a weapon already has this ability, until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability as well.

stratagems.name: FULL THROTTLE
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit (excluding WALKERS) from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, or 9" instead if your unit is MOUNTED.

stratagems.name: SHOCK ASSAULT
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LANCE] ability.

stratagems.name: RIDE HARD, RIDE FAST
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES FLY VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: WIND-SWIFT EVASION
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

enhancements.name: Fury of the Storm
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED model only. Improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons by 1. Each time the bearer ends a Charge move, until the end of the turn, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of the bearers melee weapons by 2 instead.
enhancements.flavorText: This aggressive warrior channels their eagerness to kill into each and every strike. They hit the enemy’s lines with all the ferocity of a raging tempest.

enhancements.name: Portents of Wisdom
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that unit.
enhancements.flavorText: This warrior has been made privy to omens of great threats in the wars to come. Armed with this knowledge, they and their battle-brothers enter battle with a boldness that some mistake for recklessness.

enhancements.name: Feinting Withdrawal
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.
enhancements.flavorText: This living legend of the Chapter is known for their calm in the heat of battle. Ever-observant of the ebbs and flows of the engagement, they can withdraw their warriors from the fray in good order, ready to hammer home a torrent of fire.

enhancements.name: Hunter’s Instincts
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED model only. If the bearer’s unit is in Strategic Reserves, for the purposes of setting up that unit on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.
enhancements.flavorText: This mounted huntsman espouses the value of circling the enemy and striking suddenly from an unexpected quarter upon their speeding steed, the better to land the killing blow.

detachments.name: Vanguard Spearhead
detachments.abilityDescription: Each time a ranged attack targets an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army, unless the attacking model is within 12", subtract 1 from the Hit roll and the target has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: The warriors of a Vanguard Spearhead slip through the shadows, half-seen spectres barely visible to the foe. Enemies blaze away into the gloom with increasing panic, their shots flying wide as covert specialists encircle their victims and prepare to level the killing blow.

stratagems.name: A DEADLY PRIZE
stratagems.when: Start of the Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effect: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: SURGICAL STRIKES
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

stratagems.name: STRIKE FROM THE SHADOWS
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is more than 12" away, improve the Ballistic Skill and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: CALCULATED FEINT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a PHOBOS or SCOUT SQUAD unit.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.name: GUERRILLA TACTICS
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: Up to two PHOBOS and/or SCOUT SQUAD units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.restrictions: Each unit selected for this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy models.

enhancements.name: The Blade Driven Deep
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Infiltrators ability.
enhancements.flavorText: This battlefield stalker slips through enemy territory like a spectre, leading their warriors in daring behind-enemy-lines operations.

enhancements.name: Ghostweave Cloak
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. The bearer has the Stealth and Lone Operative abilities.
enhancements.flavorText: Hand-stitched by blinded servitors and anointed with distilled blood, this cloak contains strands of mnemothread. It throws up a field of techno-spiritual dissonance that veils its wearer from sight and sensors, allowing them to slip across the battlefield like a wraith.

enhancements.name: Execute and Redeploy
enhancements.description: PHOBOS model only. In your Shooting phase, after the bearer’s unit has shot, if that unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, that unit is not eligible to declare a charge. This cannot allow the bearer’s unit to move more than once in your Shooting phase.
enhancements.flavorText: The battle-brothers under this warrior’s command seize every opportunity to strike while the initiative is theirs, harrying the foe with gunfire before returning to the shadows.

enhancements.name: Shadow War Veteran
enhancements.description: PHOBOS model only. Gain following ability:Lord of Deceit (Aura): Each time your opponent targets a unit from their army with a Stratagem, if that unit is within 12" of this model, increase the cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.
enhancements.flavorText: By the time the enemy believes battle has begun, their rear lines have already been attacked at this warriors command - their supply lines cut and their communications in disarray - choking them off from vital battlefield support.

detachments.name: 1st Company Task Force
detachments.abilityDescription: Once per battle, in your Command phase, you can use this ability. If you do, until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model from your army with the Oath of Moment ability makes an attack that targets your Oath of Moment target, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: The 1st Company’s veterans have fought at the forefront of their Chapter’s wars for many mortal lifespans. Experience has taught them to identify the foe’s lethal threats and to lead their battle-brothers to purge them from existence.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: HEROES OF THE CHAPTER
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.name: TERRIFYING PROFICIENCY
stratagems.when: Your Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
stratagems.effect: In your opponent’s next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

stratagems.name: DUTY AND HONOUR
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

stratagems.name: ORBITAL TELEPORTARIUM
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.name: LEGENDARY FORTITUDE
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

enhancements.name: The Imperium’s Sword
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the bearers melee weapons. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by all other models in the bearer’s unit as well.
enhancements.flavorText: This hero and the veterans they lead cut down their foes like a reaping whirlwind.

enhancements.name: Fear Made Manifest (Aura)
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is within 6" of the bearer, each time that unit fails a Battle-shock test, one model in that unit is destroyed (chosen by its controlling player). Once per battle, when such an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test, you can choose for D3 models in that unit to be destroyed in this way instead.
enhancements.flavorText: This warrior personifies the Emperor’s wrath.

enhancements.name: Rites of War
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR model only. Improve the Objective Control characteristic of the bearer by 1. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of all other models in the bearer’s unit as well.
enhancements.flavorText: The commanders of the 1st Company vow before the Chapter and the Emperor to secure victory.

enhancements.name: Iron Resolve
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. Once per battle, after the bearer’s unit is selected as the target of one or more attacks, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in the bearer’s unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
enhancements.flavorText: This hero shrugs off even horrendous wounds.

detachments.name: Librarius Conclave
detachments.abilityDescription:
At the start of the battle round, select one of the following Psychic Disciplines. Until the end of the battle round, that Psychic Discipline is active and its effects apply to all ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER units from your army.
Biomancy Discipline
Add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.
Divination Discipline
Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.
Pyromancy Discipline
Each time a ranged attack made by a model in this unit targets an enemy unit within 12", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
Telekinesis Discipline
Each time a ranged attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Strength characteristic of that attack.
Telepathy Discipline
Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill characteristics and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: Librarians spend their lives mastering psychic disciplines, learning how to manipulate the energies of the Immaterium to confound their foes and embolden their battle-brothers.

stratagems.name: SENSORY ASSAULT
stratagems.when: Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is within 18" of and visible to one PSYKER model in your unit. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is pinned. While a unit is pinned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it. In addition, if the Telepathy Discipline is active for your army, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: FIERY SHIELD
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models, and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll, and if the Pyromancy Discipline is active for your army, weapons that target your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

stratagems.name: IRON ARM
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models from your army and has not been selected to Fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit, or add 2 if the Biomancy Discipline is active for your army.

stratagems.name: ASSAIL
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that is eligible to shoot.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to one or more PSYKER models in your unit (excluding units with the Lone Operative ability), and roll six D6, adding 1 to each result if the Telekinesis Discipline is active for your army: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: PRESCIENT PRECISION
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability, and the [IGNORES COVER] ability as well if the Divination Discipline is active for your army.

enhancements.name: Prescience
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER model only (excluding TERMINATOR models). Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of the bearer’s unit, the bearer’s unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if the Divination Discipline is active for your army.
enhancements.flavorText: Those who specialise in prognostication may foresee the flow of battle and position their allies accordingly.

enhancements.name: Celerity
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER model only. The bearer’s unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced, and if the Biomancy Discipline is active for your army, it is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
enhancements.flavorText: The powers of the Immaterium flow through the psyker, heightening his speed and that of his battle-brothers.

enhancements.name: Obfuscation
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER model only. Enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at the bearer’s unit, and if the Telepathy Discipline is active for your army, the bearer’s unit cannot be targeted by ranged attacks unless the attacking model is within 18".
enhancements.flavorText: By manipulating the minds of the foe, practitioners of telepathy may obfuscate their presence.

enhancements.name: Fusillade
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER model only. Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit have the [ANTI-MONSTER 5+] and [ANTI-VEHICLE 5+] abilities, and:
enhancements.flavorText: The Librarian wreathes the ammunition of his allies in armour-eroding halos of azure fire.

detachments.name: Emperor’s Shield
detachments.abilityDescription:
Each time a model from your army with the Oath of Moment ability makes an attack that targets your Oath of Moment target, you can re-roll a Wound roll of 1.
Each time a model in a DARNATH LYSANDER unit from your army makes an attack that targets your Oath of Moment target, you can re-roll the Wound roll.
RESTRICTIONS
Your army can include IMPERIAL FISTS units, but it cannot include any ADEPTUS ASTARTES units drawn from any other Chapter.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: Lysander leads the elite of the Imperial Fists to where the fighting is thickest, there to bring ruin to those who would see the walls of the Imperium torn down.

enhancements.name: Champion of the Feast
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by other models in the bearer’s unit as well.
enhancements.flavorText: A victor in the Feast of Blades, this battle-brother is a master of close-quarters fighting.

enhancements.name: Disciple of Rhetoricus
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR model only. Improve the Objective Control characteristic of the bearer by 1. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of other models in the bearer’s unit as well.
enhancements.flavorText: This battle-brother is well versed in the Book of the Five Spheres, drawing upon the teachings of that ancient treatise to command with clarity and purpose.

enhancements.name: Indomitable Champion
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR model only. The first time the bearer is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set the bearer back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with 3 wounds remaining.
enhancements.flavorText: Even seemingly mortal wounds will not turn a son of Dorn from his duty.

enhancements.name: Malodraxian Standard
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES ANCIENT model only. Each time an attack targets the bearer’s unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of the bearer’s unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
enhancements.flavorText: Crafted in the aftermath of Lysander’s great victory over the Iron Warriors on Malodrax, this gilded banner inspires the Imperial Fists to shatter their foes.

detachments.name: Blade of Ultramar
detachments.abilityDescription:
At the start of up to three of your Command phases, you can select one of the Combat Doctrines listed below. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active and its effects apply to all ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army. You cannot select a Combat Doctrine you have already selected this battle, unless a friendly MARNEUS CALGAR model is on the battlefield.
Devastator Doctrine
This unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced.
Tactical Doctrine
This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
Assault Doctrine
This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
RESTRICTIONS
Your army can include ULTRAMARINES units, but it cannot include any ADEPTUS ASTARTES units drawn from any other Chapter.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: Marneus Calgar deploys the complete and nuanced wisdom of the Codex Astartes as easily and instinctively as drawing breath.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: TACTICAL FORESIGHT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than or equal to the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: COURAGE AND HONOUR!
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

stratagems.name: ULTRAMARIAN ADAPTIVITY
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select the Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for your unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Combat Doctrine this battle.

stratagems.name: EXEMPLARY VIGILANCE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

stratagems.name: PRACTICAL TACTICS
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is under the effects of the Tactical Doctrine.

enhancements.name: Armour of Antoninus
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. The bearer has a Save characteristic of 2+ and the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
enhancements.flavorText: Originally worn by a storied Captain of the Ultramarines’ First Company, this artificer armour is bestowed by the Chapter Master himself upon a worthy wearer.

enhancements.name: Oath of Macragge
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons. While the bearer is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, add 2 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons instead.
enhancements.flavorText: Amongst the most solemn and binding oaths an Ultramarine can swear, it is a rare honour to enter battle with these words affixed to their armour.

enhancements.name: Student of the Codex
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer is on the battlefield, it can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the start of your next Command phase, the Tactical Doctrine is active for this unit (instead of any other Combat Doctrine you select to be active for your army, and even if there is no Combat Doctrine active for your army).
enhancements.flavorText: This prodigal officer has focused upon one aspect of the Codex Astartes and means to master its every aspect before moving on to the next.

enhancements.name: Veteran of Behemoth
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. In addition, while the bearer’s unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that unit.
enhancements.flavorText: Having battled the Tyranid swarms since their first galactic invasion, this veteran officer knows well the benefit of efficient and overwhelming firepower.

detachments.name: Forgefather’s Seekers
detachments.abilityDescription:
Ranged weapons equipped by ADEPTUS ASTARTES models from your army have the [ASSAULT] ability, and each time an attack made with such a weapon targets a unit within 12", add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack.
SEEKER’S COMPANIONS
If your army includes VULKAN HE’STAN, during your turn, each INFERNUS SQUAD unit from your army is eligible to do one of the following:
• Start to perform an Action in a turn in which it Advanced.
• Shoot in a turn in which it started to perform an Action.
RESTRICTIONS
Your army can include SALAMANDERS units, but it cannot include any ADEPTUS ASTARTES units drawn from any other Chapter.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: Tireless in his pursuit of the Primarch’s legacy, Forgefather Vulkan He’stan annihilates any who impede his quest. Favouring swift, aggressive assaults, he and his warriors close rapidly with the enemy, destroying them at close range with ruthless efficiency

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: CRUCIBLE OF BATTLE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target within 6", add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: WRATHFUL INFERNO
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.target: That unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: IMMOLATION PROTOCOLS
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

stratagems.name: BURNING VENGEANCE
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TRANSPORT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: One unit embarked within that TRANSPORT can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.name: BLAZING EARTH
stratagems.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army equipped with one or more Torrent weapons.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES and units with the FLY keyword) within 12" of and visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, each time that enemy unit declares a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

enhancements.name: Immolator
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristics of Torrent weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit.
enhancements.flavorText: Steeped in the Promethean Cult, this battle-brother wields the flamer with unparalleled mastery, turning the battlefield into a burning pyre for the corpses of his foes.

enhancements.name: War-tempered Artifice
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY model only. Add 3 to the Strength characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons.
enhancements.flavorText: Having laboured long in the Chapter’s forges, this warrior smith has crafted his personal armaments. Each weapon is a masterwork tool of death-dealing, wrought with care and strength, and embellished with the icons of their maker’s brotherhood.

enhancements.name: Forged in Battle
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, once per turn, after making a Hit roll or a saving throw for a model in that unit, you can change the result of that roll to an unmodified 6.
enhancements.flavorText: To this Angel of Death, war is the anvil upon which their strength is wrought. Every battle is seen as a test in which they and their battle-brothers can prove themselves, and the superior craftsmanship of their weapons and armour.

enhancements.name: Adamantine Mantle
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack. If that attack was made with a Melta or Torrent weapon, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1 instead.
enhancements.flavorText: This flowing cloak or finely wrought tabard is laced through with threads of braided adamantine. When combined with armour and energy fields, it has been shown time and again that these symbols of office are proof against even the very strongest attacks.

detachments.name: Hammer of Avernii
detachments.abilityDescription: Each time a model from your army with the Oath of Moment ability makes an attack that targets your Oath of Moment target, you can re-roll a Wound roll of 1.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: Heavily enhanced with augmetics and the weight of many years of combat experience to aid them, the veteran warriors of Clan Company Avernii ruthlessly select and destroy their targets.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: RUTHLESS BUTCHERY
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES DREADNOUGHT, TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is below Starting Strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.name: DOMINATOR BEACON
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES DREADNOUGHT, TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the end of a phase.

stratagems.name: COGITATED FEROCITY
stratagems.when: Your Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES DREADNOUGHT, TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select either the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] or [LETHAL HITS] abilities. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

stratagems.name: AUGMETIC FORTITUDE
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.name: DROPSHIP EXTRACTION
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army. You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: Spiritus Ferrum
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by all other models in the bearer’s unit as well.
enhancements.flavorText: This ancient augmetic empowers its bearer - and in extremis even their comrades - with the fury of the motive force.

enhancements.name: Medusan Roar (Aura)
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is within 6" of the bearer, each time that unit fails a Battle-shock test, one model in that unit is destroyed (chosen by its controlling player). Once per battle, when such an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test, you can choose for D3 models in that unit to be destroyed in this way instead.
enhancements.flavorText: Mounted in the warrior’s gorget, this device amplifies their battle cries into terrifying sonic shock waves.

enhancements.name: Iron Laurel
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Improve the Objective Control characteristic of the bearer by 1. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of all other models in the bearer’s unit as well.
enhancements.flavorText: A subcutaneous cranial honour relic, this device contains a strategic orbital upload relay.

enhancements.name: Steel Font
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.
enhancements.flavorText: An advanced auto-chirurgeon claimed by legend to be the product of Ferrus Manus’ own labours, this device rapidly reknits sundered flesh and armour alike.

detachments.name: Spearpoint Task Force
detachments.abilityDescription: ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army are eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which they Advanced or Fell Back.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: The White Scars are masters of high-speed tactics and hit-and-run warfare. They do battle on the move and from the saddle, outwitting their enemies with breakneck manoeuvres and melting away one moment only to crash home with bone-crushing force the next.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: SPEAR THRUST AND SABRE SWING
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select either the [LANCE] or [LETHAL HITS] ability. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability. If it is a MOUNTED unit, until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] and [LETHAL HITS] abilities instead.

stratagems.name: MOBILE LETHALITY
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

stratagems.name: HUNTER’S INSTINCTS
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit. You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: EVASIVE MANOEUVRES
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES FLY VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: WITHDRAW AND REGROUP
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES FLY VEHICLE unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: Spearpoint Paragon
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons by 1. Each time the bearer ends a Charge move, until the end of the turn, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons by 2 instead.
enhancements.flavorText: Decades of service within the White Scars First Company have helped this superlative warrior master the violent arts of high-speed combat.

enhancements.name: Stormseers’ Wisdom
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that unit.
enhancements.flavorText: The Chapter’s Librarians have made this champion privy to omens of great threats in future wars. Armed with this knowledge, they lead their warriors to war with a boldness that some mistake for recklessness.

enhancements.name: Hunter’s Eye
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.
enhancements.flavorText: This augmetic eye enhances the user’s visual spectrum, enabling them to pinpoint heat signatures and cogitate appropriate firing solutions.

enhancements.name: Chogorian Huntmaster
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED model only. If the bearer’s unit is in Strategic Reserves, for the purposes of setting up that unit on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.
enhancements.flavorText: This mounted huntsman knows well the importance of manoeuvre, outflanking the enemy and ambushing unsuspecting foes from the flanks and rear, the better to land the killing blow.

detachments.name: Companions of Vehemence
detachments.abilityDescription:
You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army.
RESTRICTIONS
Your army can include BLACK TEMPLARS units, but it cannot include any ADEPTUS ASTARTES units drawn from any other Chapter.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: With their zealous hatred stoked red-hot by furious sermons and inflammatory prayers, Companions of Vehemence are filled with a wrathful vigour. Only the deaths of the God-Emperor’s enemies can assuage their fury, and they will let nothing delay them from unleashing it.

stratagems.name: DEVOUT PUSH
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".
stratagems.restrictions: A unit cannot be targeted with this and the Hearts Hardened to Duty Stratagem in the same phase unless it has the CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR keywords.

stratagems.name: HEARTS HARDENED TO DUTY
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army Consolidates.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model (or the closest enemy unit if the Suffer Not the Unclean to Live Vow is active for it).

stratagems.name: FOR THE EMPEROR'S HONOUR!
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

stratagems.name: PIOUS ENMITY
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that target is a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1 as well.

stratagems.name: HERESY BEGETS RETRIBUTION
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Retribution move. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

stratagems.name: DREAD CRUSADERS
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge.
stratagems.effect: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

enhancements.name: Incendiary Animus
enhancements.description: CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR model only. Improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit by 1.
enhancements.flavorText: This inspirational warrior exudes fierce contempt and loathing for the Emperor’s foes, inciting such apoplectic revulsion in their battle-brothers as to drive their blows with vicious strength.

enhancements.name: Oathbound Exemplar
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY model only. Add 1 to Advance rolls made for the bearer’s unit. If the mission pack you are playing features Actions, the bearer’s unit is eligible to start to perform an Action in a turn in which it Advanced.
enhancements.flavorText: With a ceaseless and booming oratory, this commander exhorts his warriors in their duty to the Emperor. Honour, he declaims, must be pursued relentlessly.

enhancements.name: Merciless Denunciation
enhancements.description: CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR model only. Each time a model in the bearer’s unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
enhancements.flavorText: Through roared words or ruthless deeds, may the blasphemous be denounced and the worthy driven into a furious rage of sanctified slaughter.

enhancements.name: Zealous Vanguard
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Models in the bearer’s unit have the Scouts 6" ability.
enhancements.flavorText: This warrior is an unstoppable crusader whose hearts burn like twin pyres of eager zeal. Ever at the forefront of combat, he leads his warriors as the tip of the crusades blade.

detachments.name: Vindication Task Force
detachments.abilityDescription:
• Each time an attack targets an ANCIENT unit from your army, if that unit is within range of one or more objective markers and the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
• Each time a CRUSADER SQUAD unit from your army makes a Righteous Zeal move, that unit can end that move as close as possible to the closest objective marker instead of as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.
RESTRICTIONS
Your army can include BLACK TEMPLARS units, but it cannot include any ADEPTUS ASTARTES units drawn from any other Chapter.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: As the battle-brothers of a Vindication Task Force purge the Emperor’s domain in fire and blood, they see their holy quest as recovering Humanity’s rightful dominion. They scour the stain of the unclean, topple false idols, breach strongholds of unholy faith and plant the crusade’s standards in their place, branding such sites with the sacred icons of their brotherhood.

stratagems.name: REFUSAL TO YIELD
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an ANCIENT model from your army is destroyed.
stratagems.target: That ANCIENT model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot target the same model with this Stratagem more than once per battle.

stratagems.name: LITANIES OF PURGATION
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if that model’s unit is within range of one or more objective markers or the target unit is within range of one or more objective markers, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: SPOOR OF THE UNHOLY
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: that attack’s Ballistic Skill or Weapon Skill characteristic; the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: RECLAIM OUR HONOUR!
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys an ANCIENT model from your army that has not been targeted with the Refusal to Yield Stratagem this phase.
stratagems.target: ed with the Refusal to Yield Stratagem this phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army visible to that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time an ADEPTUS ASTARTES model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot target that ANCIENT model with the Refusal to Yield Stratagem this phase.

stratagems.name: RECITATION OF THE REVERED
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ANCIENT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: PERFERVID INTERVENTION
